Text: Nothing wrong with this movie. I've been in Auschwitz myself last year, and all this does is confirm the story.
Seeding at 1.5 mb/s! Thanks for the torrent.

Download was quick Film plays well. However, there are many reinactments of Nazi, meetings discussing the fate of prisoners and ways of extermination. These are all spoken in German, with no subtitle or translation. I've been told that (Xivd asd), does not support subtitles. Is this correct?

Great documentary. It gets annoying at times when I believe there is supposed to be subtitled language but we only have polish titles. Its not that bad ive watched 2 parts so far and only missed out on like 5-10 mins of not knowing, so its cool.
When you play the movies with BSPLAYER it will search for subtitels if available.
